title: CPR Cell Phone Repair Continues Expansion in Michigan with New Franchise Store in Kalamazoo
text:
CPR Cell Phone Repair Continues Expansion in Michigan with New Franchise Store in Kalamazoo
CPR Cell Phone Repair, the largest and fastest growing retail mobile device repair franchise network in North America, congratulates multi-store owner Clayton Nicholson on the opening of his franchise store located in Kalamazoo.
Independence, OH, October 21, 2015 --( PR.com )-- CPR Cell Phone Repair, the largest and fastest growing retail mobile device repair franchise network in North America, is pleased to announce the opening of a new store in Kalamazoo, MI. CPR congratulates multi-store owner Clayton Nicholson on the opening of his franchise store located in Kalamazoo.
Nicholson stated, “I feel incredibly fortunate to be opening more CPR franchise stores. With the store in Kalamazoo, we now own four CPR stores including franchise locations in Portage and two locations in Grand Rapids. As a team, we have worked hard to develop both our technical and customer service skills. The entire team is really excited as we make plans to open additional CPR stores in Lansing, South Bend and Fort Wayne.”
Kalamazoo is located in the southwest region of Michigan and is equidistant between the major cities of Chicago and Detroit. The town is home to two major universities, Western Michigan University and Michigan State Kalamazoo. In 2005, Western Michigan University was ranked as the #2 Wireless Campus in the United States by the Intel Corporation. The university recently opened the Homer Stryker School of Medicine. Michigan State University Kalamazoo has continued to expand their Center for Medical Studies and it is now a major employer in town. Additionally, a number of major pharmaceutical and medical science companies, including Stryker, Pfizer and Perrigo, have facilities in Kalamazoo.
“CPR is really proud of Clayton Nicholson and his team for the success they have garnered with their Michigan franchises. For a young entrepreneur, Clayton has assembled a terrific team that is rapidly expanding CPR’s footprint throughout the region. We wish Clayton and his team continued success as they continue to provide customers with top quality repair services,” added Josh Sevick, CPR President.
CPR Cell Phone Repair of Kalamazoo is located at 5043 W. Main Street, Kalamazoo, MI 49009.
To learn more about the store’s full range of electronic device repair services, call 269-216-4801 or contact via e-mail at clayton@michigan-cpr.com.
For further information, visit the website: http://www.cellphonerepair.com/kalamazoo-mi/

About CPR Cell Phone Repair
Founded in Orlando, Fla. in 1996, CPR Cell Phone Repair is the fastest growing wireless technology franchise in North America and operates 200 locations internationally. As a pioneer and leader in the electronics repair industry, CPR offers same-day repair and refurbishing services for cell phones, laptops, gaming systems, digital music players, tablets and other personal electronic devices. CPR was named an Entrepreneur Magazine Franchise 500 (2013) ranking and earning a top brand on the Inc. 500, CPR continues to lead the mobile device repair industry.
